entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then north 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 12 except temperature steady near minus 4 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 12 except temperature steady near minus 4 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7 except temperature steady near minus 4 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7 except temperature steady near minus 4 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023
